verses.verse: And it came<WH1961> to pass in the days<WH3117> of Amraphel<WH569> king<WH4428> of Shinar,<WH8152> Arioch<WH746> king<WH4428> of Ellasar,<WH495> Chedorlaomer<WH3540> king<WH4428> of Elam,<WH5867> and Tidal<WH8413> king<WH4428> of nations;<WH1471>

That these made<WH6213> war<WH4421> with Bera<WH1298> king<WH4428> of Sodom,<WH5467> and with Birsha<WH1306> king<WH4428> of Gomorrah,<WH6017> Shinab<WH8134> king<WH4428> of Admah,<WH126> and Shemeber<WH8038> king<WH4428> of Zeboiim,<WH6636> and the king<WH4428> of Bela,<WH1106> which<WH1931> is Zoar.<WH6820>
All<WH3605> these<WH428> were joined<WH2266> together in the vale<WH6010> of Siddim,<WH7708> which<WH1931> is the salt<WH4417> sea.<WH3220>
Twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> years<WH8141> they served<WH5647> Chedorlaomer,<WH3540> and in the thirteenth<WH7969> <WH6240> year<WH8141> they rebelled.<WH4775>
And in the fourteenth year came Chedorlaomer, and the kings that were with him, and smote the Rephaims in Ashteroth Karnaim, and the Zuzims in Ham, and the Emims in Shaveh Kiriathaim,
And the Horites<WH2752> in their mount<WH2042> Seir,<WH8165> to Elparan,<WH364> which<WH834> is by the wilderness.<WH4057>

And they returned,<WH7725> and came<WH935> to Enmishpat,<WH5880> which is Kadesh,<WH6946> and smote<WH5221> all<WH3605> the country<WH7704> of the Amalekites,<WH6003> and also<WH1571> the Amorites,<WH567> that dwelled<WH3427> in Hazezontamar.<WH2688>

And there went<WH3318> out the king<WH4428> of Sodom,<WH5467> and the king<WH4428> of Gomorrah,<WH6017> and the king<WH4428> of Admah,<WH126> and the king<WH4428> of Zeboiim,<WH6636> and the king<WH4428> of Bela<WH1106> (the same<WH1931> is Zoar;<WH6820>) and they joined<WH6186> battle<WH4421> with them in the vale<WH6010> of Siddim;<WH7708>

With Chedorlaomer<WH3540> the king<WH4428> of Elam,<WH5867> and with Tidal<WH8413> king<WH4428> of nations,<WH1471> and Amraphel<WH569> king<WH4428> of Shinar,<WH8152> and Arioch<WH746> king<WH4428> of Ellasar;<WH495> four<WH702> kings<WH4428> with five.<WH2568>

And the vale<WH6010> of Siddim<WH7708> was full of slime pits;<WH2564> and the kings<WH4428> of Sodom<WH5467> and Gomorrah<WH6017> fled,<WH5127> and fell<WH5307> there;<WH8033> and they that remained<WH7604> fled<WH5127> to the mountain.<WH2022>
And they took<WH3947> all<WH3605> the goods<WH7399> of Sodom<WH5467> and Gomorrah,<WH6017> and all<WH3605> their victuals,<WH400> and went<WH3212> their way.<WH3212>
And they took<WH3947> Lot,<WH3876> Abram's<WH87> brother's<WH251> son,<WH1121> who<WH1931> dwelled<WH3427> in Sodom,<WH5467> and his goods,<WH7399> and departed.<WH3212>

And there came<WH935> one that had escaped,<WH6412> and told<WH5046> Abram<WH87> the Hebrew;<WH5680> for he dwelled<WH7931> in the plain<WH436> of Mamre<WH4471> the Amorite,<WH567> brother<WH251> of Eshcol,<WH812> and brother<WH251> of Aner:<WH6063> and these<WH1992> were confederate<WH1167> <WH1285> with Abram.<WH87>

And when<WH3588> Abram<WH87> heard<WH8085> that his brother<WH251> was taken captive,<WH7617> he armed<WH7324> his trained<WH2593> servants, born<WH3211> in his own house,<WH1004> three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> and eighteen,<WH8083> <WH6240> and pursued<WH7291> them to Dan.<WH1835>

And he divided<WH2505> himself against<WH5921> them, he and his servants,<WH5650> by night,<WH3915> and smote<WH5221> them, and pursued<WH7291> them to Hobah,<WH2327> which<WH834> is on the left<WH8040> hand<WH8040> of Damascus.<WH1834>

And he brought<WH7725> back<WH7725> all<WH3605> the goods,<WH7399> and also<WH1571> brought<WH7725> again<WH7725> his brother<WH251> Lot,<WH3876> and his goods,<WH7399> and the women<WH802> also,<WH1571> and the people.<WH5971>

And the king<WH4428> of Sodom<WH5467> went<WH3318> out to meet<WH7125> him after<WH310> his return<WH7725> from the slaughter<WH5221> of Chedorlaomer,<WH3540> and of the kings<WH4428> that were with him, at<WH413> the valley<WH6010> of Shaveh,<WH7740> which<WH1931> is the king's<WH4428> dale.<WH6010>
And Melchizedek<WH4442> king<WH4428> of Salem<WH8004> brought<WH3318> forth<WH3318> bread<WH3899> and wine:<WH3196> and he was the priest<WH3548> of the most<WH5945> high<WH5945> God.<WH410>
And he blessed<WH1288> him, and said,<WH559> Blessed<WH1288> be Abram<WH87> of the most<WH5945> high<WH5945> God,<WH410> possessor<WH7069> of heaven<WH8064> and earth:<WH776>
And blessed<WH1288> be the most<WH5945> high<WH5945> God,<WH410> which<WH834> has delivered<WH4042> your enemies<WH6862> into your hand.<WH3027> And he gave<WH5414> him tithes<WH4643> of all.<WH3605>
And the king<WH4428> of Sodom<WH5467> said<WH559> to Abram,<WH87> Give<WH5414> me the persons,<WH5315> and take<WH3947> the goods<WH7399> to yourself.

And Abram<WH87> said<WH559> to the king<WH4428> of Sodom,<WH5467> I have lift<WH7311> up my hand<WH3027> to the LORD,<WH3068> the most<WH5945> high<WH5945> God,<WH410> the possessor<WH7069> of heaven<WH8064> and earth,<WH776>

That I will not take<WH3947> from a thread<WH2339> even<WH5704> to a shoelatchet,<WH8288> <WH5275> and that I will not take<WH3947> any<WH3605> thing that is yours, lest<WH3808> you should say,<WH559> I have made Abram<WH87> rich:<WH6238>

Save<WH1107> only<WH7535> that which<WH834> the young<WH5288> men have eaten,<WH398> and the portion<WH2506> of the men<WH582> which<WH834> went<WH1980> with me, Aner,<WH6063> Eshcol,<WH812> and Mamre;<WH4471> let them take<WH3947> their portion.<WH2506>
